title: Murray Davie
text:
Murray Geoffrey Davie (born 19 September 1956) is a former New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> and <a href="water%20polo">water polo</a> player.
A rugby union <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Prop">prop</a>, Davie represented <a href="Canterbury%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Canterbury</a> at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, on the <a href="1983%20New%20Zealand%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20Scotland%20and%20England">1983 tour of Scotland and England</a>. He played five matches for the All Blacks including one test match as a substitute. He was also a New Zealand international water polo representative.
Davie attended <a href="Burnside%20High%20School">Burnside High School</a> in <a href="Christchurch">Christchurch</a> from 1969 to 1971.
